title: Sam & Kyle Answer Your Thanksgiving Questions
description:
Read more thanksgiving tips at: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/
Sam and Kyle team up once again to handle your Thanksgiving cooking & entertaining questions. If you’ve wondered “how to make sure your gravy isn’t greasy?” or “is there a way to keep your guests out of your kitchen while you cook?” – this is the video for you.

asset.title: Sam & Kyle Answer Your Thanksgiving Questions
asset.description:
Read more thanksgiving tips at: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/
Sam and Kyle team up once again to handle your Thanksgiving cooking & entertaining questions. If you’ve wondered “how to make sure your gravy isn’t greasy?” or “is there a way to keep your guests out of your kitchen while you cook?” – this is the video for you.
asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond

transcripts: I'm Sam and this is Kyle and we're answering your Thanksgiving questions. Alright first question: How do I make sure my gravy doesn't come out greasy. The problem I have two words for you gravy separator: it's simple you just pour your pan drippings into a separator and you have a start to amazing gravy at the bottom separated from the grease on top. Boom, alright Kyle it's my first thanksgiving how do I make it go smoothly because not everyone gets along. Good question I would say the key to this is a seating plan make it as festive and cordles create cute place cards at each seating and seat everyone  so no one has a chance to push anyone buttons. Number two: Do I need a roasting rack fro my turkey. If you want a good turkey then yes
